00018 void mexFunction( int nlhs, mxArray *plhs[],
00019                   int nrhs, const mxArray *prhs[] )
00020 {
00021     // Check the number of arguments
00022     if (nrhs<2 || ((nrhs%2)!=0) || nlhs>1)
00023         mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Wrong number of arguments");
00024     
00025     // Argument vector
00026     vector<MxArray> rhs(prhs,prhs+nrhs);
00027     
00028     // Option processing
00029     Mat probImage(rhs[0].toMat());
00030     Rect window(rhs[1].toRect());
00031     TermCriteria criteria(CV_TERMCRIT_EPS | CV_TERMCRIT_ITER, 10, 1);
00032     for (int i=2; i<nrhs; i+=2) {
00033         string key = rhs[i].toString();
00034         if (key=="Criteria")
00035             criteria = rhs[i+1].toTermCriteria();
00036         else
00037             mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Unrecognized option");
00038     }
00039     
00040     // Process
00041     plhs[0] = MxArray(CamShift(probImage,window,criteria));
00042 }
